1.text: Roll the lemon firmly back and forth on your countertop before you cut it.

2.text: Slice your lemon crosswise down the middle.

3.text: Hold 1 lemon half over a bowl with the cut facing up.

4.text: Squeeze the lemon half hard 3 times to get the juice out.

5.text: Press a spoon into the insides to release any remaining juice.

6.text: Press your lemon firmly back and forth into your countertop.

7.text: Try putting the lemon in the microwave to prep it instead.

8.text: Cut the lemon crosswise down the middle.

9.text: Place the lemon skin-side down into your citrus press if you have one.

10.text: Squeeze your lemon between tongs if you have joint pain.

11.text: Try pressing a fork into the center for a simple approach.

12.text: Use a mixer beater to squeeze juice out instead.
